GN.headline: Guinea: Security concerns rise amid New Year events and school calendar adjustments.
GN.what_happened: Increased R3/R4 signals likely triggered by reports of 5 deaths and 23 injuries during New Year's Eve celebrations in Guinea, despite security measures, coupled with potential disruption from school calendar adjustments.

en: In Asia, Bangladesh is seeing coverage related to R1/R3, with potential clashes/arrests/protests. Pakistan is under general observation. Afghanistan is also showing general coverage, details unverified.
Europe sees Spain and Germany under general observation with no signals detected. Italy is experiencing general coverage related to R1/R4.
The Americas: Venezuela is experiencing coverage related to R4/R1, with potential clashes/arrests/protests follow-ups. Brazil is under general observation.
In the Middle East, Syria is experiencing general coverage related to R1/R3.
Africa: Somalia is seeing coverage related to R4/R3. Switzerland is experiencing R1/R3 related coverage.
This report summarizes the surge in media coverage and does not constitute official fact certification.
ja: アジアでは、バングラデシュでR1/R3関連報道、衝突/逮捕/抗議の可能性。パキスタンは概況監視下。アフガニスタンも同様の報道あり、詳細は未確認。
欧州では、スペインとドイツで特段の兆候は確認されず。イタリアではR1/R4関連報道が確認された。
米州: ベネズエラでR4/R1関連報道、衝突/逮捕/抗議の続報の可能性。ブラジルは概況監視下。
中東: シリアでR1/R3関連報道。
アフリカ: ソマリアでR4/R3関連報道。スイスではR1/R3関連報道あり。
本稿は報道量の急増（注目度）を整理したもので、事実認定ではない。
es: En Asia, Bangladesh está experimentando cobertura relacionada con R1/R3, con posibles enfrentamientos/arrestos/protestas. Pakistán está bajo observación general. Afganistán también muestra cobertura general, detalles sin verificar.
Europa ve a España y Alemania bajo observación general sin señales detectadas. Italia está experimentando cobertura general relacionada con R1/R4.
Las Américas: Venezuela está experimentando cobertura relacionada con R4/R1, con posibles seguimientos de enfrentamientos/arrestos/protestas. Brasil está bajo observación general.
En el Medio Oriente, Siria está experimentando cobertura general relacionada con R1/R3.
África: Somalia está viendo cobertura relacionada con R4/R3. Suiza está experimentando cobertura relacionada con R1/R3.
Este informe resume el aumento de la cobertura mediática y no constituye una certificación oficial de hechos.
